welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lemon Grove, a charming city known for its vibrant community and delicious citrus fruits. Get ready to immerse yourself in our local culture and explore all the hidden gems this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Diego International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at San Diego International Airport, serving primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and is equipped with various amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to military personnel and their families, providing easy access to military bases and other locations.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, offering a more luxurious and personalized travel experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'NAS North Island WiFi' and following the prompts.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brown Field Municipal Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brown Field Municipal Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mc Clellan-Palomar Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Mc Clellan-Palomar Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
